attributes.action: Ban the use of fireworks after the 5th of November
attributes.background: All use of fireworks, public displays, and private use should be banned by law after the 5th of November, if used after the 5th of November then a fine will be enforced by law

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Only allow the use of Fireworks in residential areas by the public on 5 November
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/556346

Make it illegal for fireworks to be set off on days other than Nov 5 and Dec 31
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/559397
